title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: VR-Based Adaptive Social Skill Enhancement for Autistic Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device utilization skills and foundational understanding of social skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify social cues (e.g., eye contact, facial expression recognition) with over 80% accuracy using visual attention-guiding techniques in VR environments.
Learners can reduce cognitive load by 30% when solving complex social problems by utilizing multimodal representation strategies (text + audio + visual cues).
Learners can achieve over 70 points in social scenario performance evaluations after four or more repeated practices with an adaptive feedback system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
